alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 244 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Loxahatchee NWR, or 12 miles northwest of Coral Springs, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, West Palm Beach, Boca Raton, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Wellington, Lake Worth, Palm Beach, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Parkland, Palm Springs, Lantana, Atlantis, Loxahatchee NWR, Mission Bay, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Village Of Golf, Loxahatchee Groves and Whisper Walk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
